messageBody:
Dear Members,

I whould like to test a class with a main(String[] args) method. Depending
on the input argument it executes one thing or the other. The problem is
that on my main(String[] args) method at the end or when it founds an error,
the method System.exit() is invoked. So when I define jUnit test cases
(methods with prefix test), jUnits only runs the first test, because some
System.exit() was invoked.

Is there any way to test such kind of situations?

Thanks in advance,

David
